strategy: Steel Legion armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: Titan Legion formations have an Initiative of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Armageddon Steel Legion Regiment

formations.name: 1 Regimental HQ
formations.units: One Supreme Commander unit, nine Infantry and five Chimeras

formations.name: Mechanized Infantry Company
formations.units: One Commander unit, nine Infantry and five Chimeras

formations.name: Infantry Company
formations.units: One Commander unit and twelve Infantry

formations.name: Leman Russ Company
formations.units: Nine Leman Russ and one Leman Russ Vanquisher

formations.name: Artillery Company
formations.units: Six Basilisks or six Manticores. Six Gun Emplacements.
upgrades: *Only the Flak Upgrade may be added to a Artillery Company.

sections.name: Support Formations
sections.description: Up to two Support Formations for each Core Formation.

formations.name: 0–1 Deathstrike Battery
upgrades: Add two Gun Emplacements for +25 points

formations.name: Artillery Battery
upgrades: Add three Gun Emplacements for +25 points

formations.name: Bombard Battery
upgrades: Add three Gun Emplacements for +25 points

formations.name: Flak Battery
upgrades: Add three Gun Emplacements for +25 points

formations.name: Super-Heavy Tank Platoon
formations.units: One Baneblade, Shadowsword, Stormsword or Stormblade

formations.name: Leman Russ Platoon
formations.units: Six Leman Russ, Leman Russ Demolishers or Leman Russ Conquerors

formations.name: Tempestus Scions
formations.units: Eight Tempestus Scions and one Tempestor
upgrades: Add four Taurox or four Valkyries: +150 points

sections.name: Titan Legion and Imperial Navy Formations
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Titan Legion and Imperial Navy Formations

formations.name: Warhound Pack
upgrades: Warhound Pack gains the 'Independent' special rule for +50 points.

formations.name: 0–1 Orbital Support
upgrades: Replace with an Emperor Class Battleship for +50 points

upgrades.title: Steel Legion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per Formation with the exception of valkyries and vendetta upgrades.

options.description: Add four Fire Support Squad units
Add three Leman Russ, Leman Russ Demolishers or Leman Russ Conquerors
Replace the Regimental HQ Commissar with a Lord Commissar.
* These upgrades may add Chimeras. All infantry units in the formation must be transported in Chimeras and the minimum Chimeras are to be taken.
